faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Buying a Shop in Sector 23 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get quick and reliable answers to your most pressing questions regarding commercial property investment and ownership in Sector 23 Gurugram.

faqs.question: What kind of return on investment can I expect from a shop in Sector 23
faqs.answer: The expected Return on Investment or ROI for commercial shops in Sector 23 is generally high due to stable rental demand and steady capital appreciation. While specific figures depend on the shop's size location and complex quality, investors often see annualized rental yields in the range of 5% to 8%. Furthermore the rapid development surrounding Dwarka Expressway ensures long-term capital growth significantly boosting the overall ROI over a holding period of five to seven years.

faqs.question: Are there ready-to-move commercial shops available in Sector 23 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 23 offers a mix of both under-construction and ready-to-move commercial shops allowing investors flexibility based on their readiness to invest and their required possession timeline. Ready-to-move shops are highly sought after as they facilitate immediate possession and commencement of rental income generation without waiting for project completion and approvals.

faqs.question: What are the common sizes for shops available for sale in this area
faqs.answer: Shop sizes in Sector 23 are highly varied to cater to different business needs. You can find smaller units starting from 250 square feet suitable for cafes or kiosks up to large retail floor plates exceeding 2000 square feet ideal for banks or supermarkets. We provide detailed floor plans and measurements for all listed properties to help you choose the right fit.

faqs.question: How does the connectivity of Sector 23 affect its commercial viability
faqs.answer: Sector 23’s excellent connectivity is its most significant commercial advantage. It is strategically placed with easy access to the main arterial roads connecting Gurugram to Delhi and the airport. This superior road network ensures high visibility for businesses and allows for smooth movement of goods and high customer traffic making commercial spaces highly desirable for leasing.

faqs.question: What is the typical lock-in period for commercial leases in Sector 23
faqs.answer: Commercial leases in high-demand areas like Sector 23 usually have a lock-in period ranging from 3 to 5 years especially when dealing with established retail chains or banks. This stability in tenancy is highly attractive to investors providing guaranteed rental income for an extended duration and reducing administrative overhead.

faqs.question: Is financing easily available for purchasing a commercial shop in this sector
faqs.answer: Yes leading banks and NBFCs readily offer commercial property loans for investments in established sectors like Sector 23 Gurugram. Loan eligibility and terms depend on the investor's financial profile and the specific property value. We can connect you with specialized financial advisors to streamline the loan application process.

faqs.question: Are shops in Sector 23 suitable for food and beverage businesses
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sector 23’s dense residential catchment area makes it ideal for F&B businesses including restaurants cafes and takeaways. Many commercial complexes are designed with provisions for kitchen ventilation and necessary utility connections making them highly suitable for food service operations and attracting significant demand.

faqs.question: What are the hidden costs associated with buying a commercial property here
faqs.answer: Beyond the basic sale price potential buyers should factor in stamp duty registration charges Goods and Services Tax GST if applicable especially on new construction and potential maintenance charges or corpus fund contributions to the commercial society. Our team ensures complete transparency regarding all associated costs upfront.

faqs.question: Does Sector 23 have dedicated parking facilities for commercial properties
faqs.answer: Most modern commercial complexes offering shops For Sale in Sector 23 provide adequate dedicated parking facilities including surface parking and multi-level basement parking. Ample parking is a key selling point for retail businesses ensuring customer convenience and compliance with Gurugram's municipal requirements.

faqs.question: Can I buy a commercial property in Sector 23 as a Non-Resident Indian NRI
faqs.answer: Yes NRIs are legally permitted to invest in commercial properties including shops in Sector 23 Gurugram. The process involves specific compliance requirements such as routing funds through NRE or NRO accounts. We offer specialized consulting services to assist NRIs through the entire regulatory and transactional process seamlessly.
